actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To establish the Bipartisan Panel to Design Long-Range Social Security Reform.
short_title: Bipartisan Panel to Design Long-Range Social Security Reform Act of 1998
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Bipartisan Panel to Design Long-Range Social Security Reform Act of 1998 - Establishes the Bipartisan Panel to Design Long-Range Social Security Reform to design a single set of legislative and administrative recommendations for long-range reforms for restoring the solvency of the social security system and maintaining retirement income security in the United States. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Bipartisan Panel to Design Long-Range Social Security Reform Act of 1998
To establish the Bipartisan Panel to Design Long-Range Social Security Reform.
